steps.description: Travel to the Menethil Harbor Dock
Take the boat to Darkshore.

tips.text: Level your First Aid while waiting

steps.description: Talk to Gershala Nightwhisper and accept Researching the Corruption
Talk to Caylais Moonfeather and fly to Teldrassil
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Argent Guard Manados and Dawnwatcher Shaedlass upstairs. Accept Twilight Falls and In Search of Thaelrid
Take the purple portal back to Rut'theran Village
Talk to Vesprystus and fly to Ashenvale
Grind Furbolgs north of Astranaar for Wool Cloth while you assemble a group
Travel to Blackfathom Deeps
Kill Fallenroot Rogues, Fallenroot Satyrs, Blackfathom Oracles and Blackfathom Tide Priestesses. Loot them for their Corrupted Brain Stems.

tips.text: You may also loot Corrupted Brain Stems once inside the Instance

steps.description: Open the Pitted Iron Chest underwater near the area with the turtles. Loot it for Lorgalis' Manuscript
Talk to Argent Guard Thaelrid. Turn in In Search of Thaelrid and accept Blackfathom Villainy
Kill all of the Twilight's Hammer. Loot them for their Twilight Pendants
Kill Twilight Lord Kelris. Loot him for his Head

Kill Nagas and Satyrs. Loot them for their Corrupted Brain Stems. If you haven't completed this quest yet, click on the altar at the end of the dungeon to teleport you to the entrance. The mobs outside of the instance can also drop it
Talk to Daelyshia and fly to Teldrassil
Talk to Argent Guard Manados up stairs and turn in Twilight Falls
Talk to Dawnwatcher Selgorm up stairs and turn in Blackfathom Villainy
Take the purple portal back to Rut'theran
Talk to Vesprystus or Daelyshia and fly to Darkshore
Talk to Gershala Nightwhisper and turn in Researching the Corruption
Talk to Caylais Moonfeather or Daelyshia and fly to Stonetalon
Talk to Keeper Albagorm and accept Reclaiming the Charred Vale
Travel towards Gaxim Rustfizzle
Talk to Gaxim Rustfizzle. Turn in Ineptitude + Chemicals = Fun and Special Delivery for Gaxim. Accept Covert Ops - Alpha and Covert Ops - Beta
Travel to Windshear Crag
Loot the Venture Co. Engineering Plans on the box
Travel to the Windshear Crag Mine
Open the Venture Co. Documents. Loot it for the Venture Co. Letters.

tips.text: Do NOT enter the Mine. The Venture Co. Letters are outside the Mine on a box

steps.description: Talk to Gaxim Rustfizzle. Turn in Covert Ops - Alpha and Covert Ops - Beta. Accept Kaela's Update
Talk to Kaela Shadowspear. Turn in Kaela's Update. Accept Enraged Spirits and Wounded Ancients
Travel to The Charred Vale. Follow the Arrow for a shortcut
Kill Burning Ravagers, Burning Destroyers and Rogue Flame Spirits. Loot them for their Embers. Kill Charred Ancients and Blackened Ancients. Loot them for their Shrapnel
Kill Bloodfury Harpies, Bloodfury Ambushers, Bloodfury Slayers and Bloodfury Roguefeathers
Kill Blackened Basilisks, Scorched Basilisk and Singed Basilisks. Loot them for their Scales
Talk to Kaela Shadowspear. Turn in Enraged Spirits and Wounded Ancients. Accept Update for Sentinel Thenysil
Travel to The Charred Vale, then onward to Desolace. Follow the Arrow for a shortcut
Travel to Desolace
Talk to Baritanas Skyriver. Get the Desolace Flight Path and fly to Stonetalon
Talk to Keeper Albagorm. Turn in Reclaiming the Charred Vale and accept Reclaiming the Charred Vale
Talk to Teloren and fly to Ashenvale
Abandon Special Delivery for Gaxim
Talk to Shindrell Swiftfire and accept Kayneth Stillwind
Talk to Sentinel Thenysil. Turn in Update for Sentinel Thenysil and accept Reception from Tyrande
Talk to Raene Wolfrunner and accept Culling the Threat
Travel to Thistlefur Village. Follow the Arrow for a shortcut
Kill Dal Bloodclaw. Loot him for his Skull. Dal Bloodclaw patrols Thistlefur Village

tips.text: Dal Bloodclaw patrols Thistlefur Village

steps.description: Kill Ilkrud Magthrull. Loot him for his Tome.

tips.text: Ilkrud Magthrull will cast Ilkrud's Guardians which is a 5 second long cast and will summon 2 Voidwalkers. Stop this cast if you're able to
Clear an exit path if needed so you can reset them along with the Succubus if needed

steps.description: Talk to Sentinel Melyria Frostshadow and accept The Howling Vale
Talk to Illiyana and accept Vile Satyr! Dryads in Danger!
Talk to Delgren the Purifier. Turn in The Tower of Althalaxx and accept The Tower of Althalaxx
Talk to Talen and accept Ruuzel
Kill Ruuzel. Loot her for the Ring of Zoram.

tips.text: Ruuzel patrols the island with a Wrathtail Myrmidon and Wrathtail Sea Witch. Kill one of them and then reset them if needed
Lady Vespia is a rarespawn that can also drop the Ring of Zoram if you see her

steps.description: Talk to Talen and turn in Ruuzel
Talk to Raene Wolfrunner. Turn in Culling the Threat. Accept Raene's Cleansing and An Aggressive Defense
Talk to Pelturas Whitemoon and accept Fallen Sky Lake
Talk to Shael'dryn. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing
Kill Withered Ancients and Crazed Ancients. Loot them for a Wooden Key
Open the Worn Chest. Loot it for the Iron Shaft
Run up here for a shortcut
Click the Tome of Mel'Thandris on the table
Talk to Anilia. Turn in Vile Satyr! Dryads in Danger! and accept The Branch of Cenarius
Kill Geltharis. Loot him for his Branch.

tips.text: Geltharis is level 32. If you are not confident, skip this step. He isn't particularly dangerous. He doesn't cast any spells. Ensure you clear the area before attempting him

steps.description: Talk to Kayneth Stillwind. Turn in Kayneth Stillwind and accept Forsaken Diseases
Talk to Jarrodenus. Get the Azshara flight path and fly to Ashenvale
Talk to Sentinel Melyria Frostshadow. Turn in The Howling Vale and accept Velinde Starsong
Talk to Illiyana. Turn in The Branch of Cenarius and accept Satyr Slaying!
Abandon The Branch of Cenarius
Talk to Shael'dryn. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing
Talk to Sentinel Velene Starstrike and accept Elemental Bracers
Use your Elixir of Water Breathing

tips.text: Use your Elixir of Water Breathing

steps.description: Kill Befouled Water Elementals. Loot them for their Bracers.

tips.text: The Befouled Water Elementals cast Frost Nova. Pay attention to your breath timer if you dive underwater to kill them

steps.description: Use the Divining Scroll to create the Divined Scroll

tips.text: Use the Divining Scroll to create the Divined Scroll

steps.description: Talk to Sentinel Velene Starstrike. Turn in Elemental Bracers and accept Mage Summoner
Kill Foulweald Warriors, Foulweald Totemics, Foulweald Ursas and a Foulweald Den Watcher
Kill the Shadethicket Oracle. Loot it for the Fallen Moonstone
Kill Rotting Slimes. Open the Rusty Chests. Loot it for the Iron Pommel

tips.text: After Rotting Slimes die a Rusty Chest will spawn on their corpse. The Rusty Chests don't have a 100% chance to drop

steps.description: Loot the Bottle of Disease on the table.

tips.text: Be cautious as the Forsaken defending it can be in Stealth

steps.description: Travel to The Barrens. Follow the Arrow to avoid Barrens Guards
Ascend Dreadmist Peak. Follow the Arrow to the top
Kill Sarilus Foulborne. Loot him for his Head.

tips.text: The surrounding Burning Blade are only level 10-12

steps.description: Travel to Ratchet. Follow the Arrow to avoid Barrens Guards
Talk to Bragok. Get the Ratchet flight path and fly to Azshara
Talk to Kayneth Stillwind and turn in Forsaken Diseases
Kill Satyrs. Loot them for their Horns. Don't go out of your way to finish this yet

tips.text: Don't go out of your way to finish this yet

steps.description: Click the Circle of Imprisonment in Satyrnaar
Click the Circle of Imprisonment in Night Run. Be cautious of Felmusk Shadowstalkers in Stealth

tips.text: Be cautious of Felmusk Shadowstalkers in Stealth

steps.description: Kill Satyrs. Loot them for their Horns
Talk to Shael'dryn. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing
Travel toward the Hidden Shrine
Click the Hidden Shrine. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing
Talk to Shael'dryn. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing
Talk to Pelturas Whitemoon and turn in Fallen Sky Lake
Talk to Raene Wolfrunner. Turn in An Aggressive Defense and Raene's Cleansing. Accept Raene's Cleansing
Talk to Sentinel Velene Starstrike and turn in Mage Summoner.

tips.text: This quest will reward you with the Light of Elune
Light of Elune - Grants immunity from all damage and spells for 10 sec.
This is a ONE time use only. Use it in an emergency

steps.description: Travel toward Krolg
Use Dartol's Rod of Transformation to turn into a Furbolg

tips.text: Use Dartol's Rod of Transformation to turn into a Furbolg

steps.description: Talk to Krolg. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing

tips.text: You must use Dartol's Rod of Transformation to turn into a Furbolg before talking to Krolg

steps.description: Kill Bloodtooth Guards and Ran Bloodtooth. Loot him for his Skull
Travel toward Krolg
Use Dartol's Rod of Transformation to turn into a Furbolg

tips.text: Use Dartol's Rod of Transformation to turn into a Furbolg

steps.description: Talk to Krolg. Turn in Raene's Cleansing and accept Raene's Cleansing

tips.text: You must use Dartol's Rod of Transformation to turn into a Furbolg before talking to Krolg

steps.description: Travel toward Raene Wolfrunner in Astranaar.

tips.text: If you Turn in Raene's Cleansing you will gain 3,050XP, but you will permanently lose Dartol's Rod of Transformation
If you wish to keep it for RP purposes, abandon Raene's Cleansing, and Dartol's Rod of Transformation will remain in your bags

steps.description: Talk to Raene Wolfrunner and turn in Raene's Cleansing
Talk to Illiyana and turn in Satyr Slaying!
Talk to Delgren the Purifier and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx
Talk to Delgren the Purifier. Turn in The Tower of Althalaxx and accept The Tower of Althalaxx
Talk to Daelyshia and fly to Teldrassil
Take the purple portal into Darnassus
Talk to Elissa Dumas and train Teleport: Darnassus
Talk to Jandria and train your class spells
Talk to Tyrande Whisperwind and turn in Reception from Tyrande
Talk to Arias'ta Bladesinger and train your class spells
Talk to Thyn'tel Bladeweaver. Turn in Velinde Starsong and accept Velinde's Effects
Run up into the Sentinel's Bunkhouse and across the over-head bridge. Open Velinde's Locker. Loot it for Velinde's Journal
Talk to Thyn'tel Bladeweaver. Turn in Velinde's Effects and accept The Barrens Port
Talk to Garryeth, Lairn or Idriana. Deposit Musquash Root into your bank
Talk to Denatharion and train your class spells
Talk to Jocaste and train your class spells
Talk to Silvaria up the ramp and train your pet spells
Talk to Syurna and train your class spells
Take the purple portal back to Rut'theran Village
Talk to Vesprystus or Daelyshia and fly to Darkshore
Talk to Balthule Shadowstrike and turn in The Tower of Althalaxx.

tips.text: Skip the follow up quest. It's a fairly difficult quest to do (you'll have to deal with 3 caster mobs w/ Voidwalkers)

steps.description: Talk to Gelkak Gyromast and accept Gyromast's Retrieval.

tips.text: This is a low level quest but it gives you 5 Elixirs of Water Breathing that are going to be used later

steps.description: Kill Raging Reef Crawlers and Encrusted Tide Crawlers. Loot them for the Bottom of Gelkak's Key.

tips.text: This is a low level quest but it gives you 5 Elixirs of Water Breathing that are going to be used later

steps.description: Kill Greymist Oracles and Greymist Tidehunter. Loot them for the Middle of Gelkak's Key.

tips.text: This is a low level quest but it gives you 5 Elixirs of Water Breathing that are going to be used later

steps.description: Kill Giant Foreststriders. Loot them for the Top of Gelkak's Key.

tips.text: This is a low level quest but it gives you 5 Elixirs of Water Breathing that are going to be used later

steps.description: Talk to Gelkak Gyromast. Turn in Gyromast's Retrieval and accept Gyromast's Revenge
Talk to The Threshwackonator 4100 to start the escort. Escort The Threshwackonator 4100 to Gelkak Gyromast. Kill The Threshwackonator 4100 once it turns hostile

tips.text: This is a low level quest but it gives you 5 Elixirs of Water Breathing that are going to be used later

steps.description: Talk to Gelkak Gyromast and turn in Gyromast's Revenge
Delete Gyromast's Key from your inventory
Hearth to Menethil Harbor. Buy food/water if needed

tips.text: Buy food/water if needed

steps.description: Hearth to Menethil Harbor. Buy food if needed

tips.text: Buy food if needed
